Package jinngine.collision

Interface Summary
BroadfaseCollisionDetection Broad-phase collision detection is the process of finding objects in a simulation, that are in close proximity of each other.
BroadfaseCollisionDetection.Handler A handler for broad-phase collision detection events.
ClosestPointsAlgorithm<T,U> An algorithm capable of determening the closest points between two given geometry template types
 

Class Summary
AllPairsTest A naive broad-phase collision detection algorithm.
ExpandingPolytope Naive implementation of the expanding polytope algorithm.
GJK3 Implementation of the Gilbert-Johnsson-Keerthi algorithm, for computing the distance between convex objects and/or closest points.
RayCast  
SweepAndPrune Sweep and Prune implementation of the BroadfaseCollisionDetection interface.
